summary: U.S. Marine sergeants Quirt and Flagg are inveterate romantic rivals on peacetime assignments in China and the Philippines. In 1917, W.W. I brings them to France, where Flagg, now a captain... See full summary Â»
cast: Edmund Lowe|Victor McLaglen|Dolores del Rio|William V. Mong|Phyllis Haver|Elena Jurado|Leslie Fenton|Barry Norton|Sammy Cohen|Ted McNamara|August Tollaire|Mathilde Comont|Patrick Rooney|J. Carrol Naish|Jack Pennick|Lily Tietelbaum|Clarence Wilson
title: El precio de la gloria
